attributes.action: officially and publicly condemn the Armenian Genocide as such.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: "Times change, but as other civilised nations recognise, the universal crimes of genocide and torture have no statute of limitations. Judge Balthazar Garzon, in opening his investigation of the crimes of the Franco era, declared that their perpetrators should have no posthumous impunity: the same might be said of the authors of the Armenian Genocide." - Geoffrey Robertson QC, Legal opinion on the Armenian Genocide, October 2009
